Membership is open to all. If you would like to join our great team, be sure to add your name to the <nowiki>[[MissouriTeam-TeamList?action=edit|Members List]]</nowiki>^1^. This will allow you to edit the members page directly. If you do not have an account already you can register from there.

Regular Members have no obligations. However there are a few of the ways to become an active member once you join:

* Become a part of the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-missouri|Missouri Loco Launchpad team]]</nowiki>
* Join our Team's <nowiki>[[MissouriTeam-IRC|IRC channel]]</nowiki>: #ubuntu-missouri on freenode.net
* Talk with others on the <nowiki>[[http://lists.ubuntu.com/ubuntu-us-mo|Mailing List]]</nowiki>
* Help with the <nowiki>[[MissouriTeam-Projects-Documentation|MissouriTeam Wiki]]</nowiki>
* Befriend other members on <nowiki>[[http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=4101034122|Facebook]]</nowiki>
* Suggest and claim Team <nowiki>[[MissouriTeam-Projects|projects and goals.]]</nowiki>

'' '''Your ideas count!''' Become an active member and make your ideas count.'' 

== Team List ==
----
1. To edit the <nowiki>[[MissouriTeam-TeamList?action=edit| TeamList Wiki page]]</nowiki>, you need to have a Launchpad.net account.  This is also the only way to officially join the team.  For more information see <nowiki>[[MissouriTeam-HowToJoin| how to join]]</nowiki>.
